ring.combat-introduction-1: Fillies and gentlecolts, round up for the next fight !
ring.combat-introduction-2: Tonight, {{name1}} and {{name2}} will beat each other to a pulp for your pleasure !
ring.combat-ending-part-0: Wow ! What a fight have these two colosses shown us !
ring.cheers-0: Get them, {{name}} ! You can do it !
ring.cheers-1: No one can stop {{name}} ! Fuck'em up !
ring.cheers-3: I've got my money on you, {{name}} !
